answers.answer: its not necessary you to be pregnant, it can be just your periods is late , and spotting can also means a sign of your periods that you can start your periods anytime. Good luck

it is possible for you to be pregnant and it not show up in the urine test you really need a blood test to be absolute sure.When you did the home test did you make sure that you were using the first morning urine which will contain the highest amount of the pregnancy hormone

question: hi this is new for me but i really need answers. my period is 20 days late several home tests have come up negative today i started very light spotting. my doctor said she wouldn't do a blood test but did draw blood for some other test like diabetes metabolic panel and my thyroid all tests came back perfectly normal. stress has never really affected anything... there really is no stress in my life. and now the light spotting is even lighter. could i be pregnant and it is just not showing up on a test for some strange reason....
title: confused
